name: CLKComplicationTemplateExtraLargeStackImage
desc: A template for displaying a single image with a short line of text below it.

items.name: init(line1ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider, line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template from the provided image and text.

items.name: var highlightLine2: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating which line should be drawn with a highlight.

items.name: var line1ImageProvider: CLKImageProvider
items.desc: The image to display on the top line of the complication.

items.name: var line2TextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display on the bottom line of the complication.
